alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southern Worcester; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 25 at 1:55PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...SNOW WILL CONTINUE TO RESULT IN SLIPPERY TRAVEL THIS AFTERNOON... An area of steady snow focused across interior Massachusetts, northern Connecticut and parts of Rhode Island will result in slippery travel for the remainder of the afternoon. Up to 1" of snow accumulation is expected...but some localized 2" amounts are possible across parts of southwest Massachusetts and northern Connecticut. Given the very cold temperatures...the snow will continue to stick on roadways resulting in slippery travel along with reduced visibility. The bulk of the steady snow should come to an end by early evening. Motorists are urged to drive with extra caution and expect snow covered and slippery roads across this region.
